text: The Marshall Comets were a Lone Star League minor league baseball team based in Marshall, Texas that played in 1947. Paul Kardow managed the team for part of the year.BR Minors page In its lone year of existence, the team was 76-63, finishing third in the standings and losing the league finals. ==References== Category:Baseball teams established in 1947 Category:Defunct minor league baseball teams Category:Sports clubs disestablished in 1947 Category:1947 establishments in Texas Category:1947 disestablishments in Texas Category:Defunct baseball teams in Texas
title: Marshall Comets
